translations: n.（车辆）保险杠；<古>大满杯敬酒；（为跳栏或障碍赛作准备的）新马平地赛；<旧>（板球）反弹球；广告时段；<非正式>烟头
adj.丰收的，丰盛的；巨大的，大号的

phrs.translation: 前保险杠；前车挡；前缓冲铁

sentences.sentence: One of my grocery bags was still precariously perched on the car bumper.
sentences.translation: 我的一只购物袋还很不牢靠地悬挂在汽车保险杠上。

sentences.sentence: When I pulled out of the space, I nicked the rear bumper of the car in front of me.
sentences.translation: 我把车从车位开出来时，蹭到了我前面那辆车的后保险杠。

sentences.sentence: There is hope of a bumper harvest.
